name: Boomer Corps OH SHOOT ft - Whemenoc
name_original: Boomer Corps OH SHOOT ft - Whemenoc
description:
Whemenoc sound design/song https://whemenoc.bandcamp.com/

Emptyezio22 - programming/Art   www.okboomerok.weebly.com

 

WASD to move

R to restart 

left click to shoot 

blue ammo boxes give 25 bullets

hearts give 1 heart if not full health

bullets bounce off walls

aliens have 2 health and robots have 4

1 shot = 1 heart

Enemies deal 1 damage
